title: Was wondering, what is up with the law enforcement and what are their roles? Ya\'all have SHERIFF DEPT  LOCAL POLICE and NC STATE TROOPERS. Thanks. Ps. We are new to this BEAUTIFUL place and feel so fortunate to be a part of it. Donna B.
text:
Like
most area, the city police handle the city, Sheriff's Dept. handles
the county and State Troopers the state and county areas. All roles
are basically the same, but with different areas they cover. And each
law enforcement office does work with the other, depending on the case
and those involved.
